EmailTemplate.subject: NCS Information Pack – Your Next Steps
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
Your NCS information pack: final steps and need-to-knows
Dear Parent or Guardian of {!Contact.Name},
As we discussed, even though {!Contact.FirstName}’s place on NCS is not confirmed yet, they have a good chance of getting a confirmed place. So you can prepare, please read this pack carefully. There’s lots of important information here, including:
- Your NCS Timetable – shows meeting points, dates, times and accommodation for the residential parts. You will need to organise {!Contact.FirstName}’s transport to the meeting points and from the return points. Click here to see this: {!Wave__c.Programme_Pack_Letters__c} - Your NCS Information Booklet – gives you essential information about NCS, including packing lists and how to contact us in an emergency. Click here to see this: {!Wave__c.Programme_booklet__c}
As {!Contact.FirstName}’s parent or guardian, there are two important things you need to do before {!Contact.FirstName} starts NCS:
1. Please contact us to make sure we have a correct emergency phone number for you. It’s your responsibility to make sure we have a correct number and someone will be available to take calls on it.
2. Please contact us if there have been any changes to the medical, support or dietary information you gave us about {!Contact.FirstName}, or if you need to give us any other details. You’re responsible for making sure we have full and up-to-date medical, support and dietary information, including details of any medication*.
You can call us on 0203 542 2400 or email us at contact@ncsthechallenge.org if you have any questions or need to give us any information. Please quote {!Contact.FirstName}’s NCS ID number: {!Contact.NCS_ID__c}.
Please note: {!IF(Wave_Selection__c.All_girl_wave__c = "Yes"," All young people and pastoral staff on this NCS programme will be female. However, there may be some male staff, or male young people from other groups, at the venues.","")}
- {!Contact.FirstName}’s place on NCS is not guaranteed - you will receive confirmation in writing if {!Contact.FirstName} gets a confirmed place.
The NCS Team - The Challenge
* As standard, The Challenge does not accept responsibility for any medication that a young person brings on NCS. This includes administering medication. Please see our consent statement for more information. If there needs to be an exception for the young person or if you have any concerns, please contact us.
